General.Name: Zhejiang Huilong New Materials Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Huilong New Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of dope dyed fibers in China. The company offers colored polyester filament yarns, such as draw texturing yarns, finished yarns, and partially oriented yarns. Zhejiang Huilong New Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

0.Name: Mr. Shunhua  Shen
0.Title: Chairman, GM & Acting Sec. of the Board of Directors
